languages.text: "Тот же, кто учил и тебя. Почтенный Висирь открыл мне многое о том, как надлежит веровать в Него. А эти шипы... конечно, они тебе знакомы. Ты носила их многие годы, прежде чем вручить мне в дар".

"The same man who taught you. The honoured Vizsier revealed to me much about how one should show their faith in Him. As for these thorns... of course you would recognise them. You wore them for many years before presenting them to me."
languages.original_text: "Тот же, кто учил и тебя. Почтенный Висирь открыл мне многое о том, как надлежит веровать в Него. А эти шипы... конечно, они тебе знакомы. Ты носила их многие годы, прежде чем вручить мне в дар".

languages.text: «El mismo hombre que la enseñó a usted. El honorable Visir me reveló mucho sobre cómo mostrar la fe en Él. En cuanto a las espinas... claro que las reconoce. Las llevó durante años antes de entregármelas».
languages.original_text: "The same man who taught you. The honoured Vizsier revealed to me much about how one should show their faith in Him. As for these thorns... of course you would recognise them. You wore them for many years before presenting them to me."

traits.locale_text: «El mismo hombre que la enseñó a usted. El honorable Visir me reveló mucho sobre cómo mostrar la fe en Él. En cuanto a las espinas... claro que las reconoce. Las llevó durante años antes de entregármelas».

languages.text: 「あなたに教えたのと同一人物です。誉れ高きヴィジールは、人が神への信仰をどのように示すべきかについて多くのことを教えてくれた。この棘についても…もちろん、あなたもお気づきだったでしょう。私に渡してくるまで、何年もご自身が身に着けていたのだから」
languages.original_text: "The same man who taught you. The honoured Vizsier revealed to me much about how one should show their faith in Him. As for these thorns... of course you would recognise them. You wore them for many years before presenting them to me."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたに教えたのと同一人物です。誉れ高きヴィジールは、人が神への信仰をどのように示すべきかについて多くのことを教えてくれた。この棘についても…もちろん、あなたもお気づきだったでしょう。私に渡してくるまで、何年もご自身が身に着けていたのだから」

languages.text: “正是那个教导了你的人，尊敬的宿老教会了我许多关于神皇信仰的知识。至于尖刺……你自然再熟悉不过，毕竟你亲自佩戴了它很多年，之后送给了我。”
languages.original_text: "The same man who taught you. The honoured Vizsier revealed to me much about how one should show their faith in Him. As for these thorns... of course you would recognise them. You wore them for many years before presenting them to me."

traits.locale_text: “正是那个教导了你的人，尊敬的宿老教会了我许多关于神皇信仰的知识。至于尖刺……你自然再熟悉不过，毕竟你亲自佩戴了它很多年，之后送给了我。”

languages.text: "Derselbe Mann, der Euch unterrichtet hat. Der ehrwürdige Wesir hat mir viel darüber verraten, wie man seinen Glauben an Ihn zeigt. Und was diese Dornen angeht ... natürlich erkennt Ihr sie. Ihr habt sie viele Jahre lang getragen, bevor Ihr sie mir gezeigt habt."
languages.original_text: "The same man who taught you. The honoured Vizsier revealed to me much about how one should show their faith in Him. As for these thorns... of course you would recognise them. You wore them for many years before presenting them to me."

traits.locale_text: "Derselbe Mann, der Euch unterrichtet hat. Der ehrwürdige Wesir hat mir viel darüber verraten, wie man seinen Glauben an Ihn zeigt. Und was diese Dornen angeht ... natürlich erkennt Ihr sie. Ihr habt sie viele Jahre lang getragen, bevor Ihr sie mir gezeigt habt."

languages.text: « Le même homme qui vous a instruite. Le vénérable vizir m'a beaucoup appris sur la façon dont nous devons prouver notre foi en Lui. Quant à ces épines... il est tout naturel que vous les reconnaissiez. Vous les avez portées de longues années avant de m'en faire cadeau. »
languages.original_text: "The same man who taught you. The honoured Vizsier revealed to me much about how one should show their faith in Him. As for these thorns... of course you would recognise them. You wore them for many years before presenting them to me."

traits.locale_text: « Le même homme qui vous a instruite. Le vénérable vizir m'a beaucoup appris sur la façon dont nous devons prouver notre foi en Lui. Quant à ces épines... il est tout naturel que vous les reconnaissiez. Vous les avez portées de longues années avant de m'en faire cadeau. »

languages.text: "Seni eğiten adamın ta kendisi. Muhterem Vezir, bana İmparator'a inancını nasıl göstermen gerektiğine dair çok şey gösterdi. Dikenler hususuna gelirsek... Tabii ki aşina olursun. Bana armağan edene dek onları seneler boyunca taşımıştın."
languages.original_text: "The same man who taught you. The honoured Vizsier revealed to me much about how one should show their faith in Him. As for these thorns... of course you would recognise them. You wore them for many years before presenting them to me."
